Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Just put them into Special and medisave account is the easiest for almost risk free 4%-5% returns. If you wan to use CPFIS, you will have to do more research about investments.0 comments0
